data.title: How useful is Monte Carlo simulation for financial decision making and risk management?
data.meta_description: Answer (1 of 3): Monte Carlo and simulation are two different things. Monte Carlo adds randomness to a deterministic problem to get an approximate solution faster than analytics methods. It is particularly helpful in high dimensional problems, because its efficiency is not affected by number of d...
